titles.title: Thou Hidden Source Of Calm Repose (nice tune e

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou hidden Source of calm repose Thou all sufficient Love divine My help and refuge from my foes Secure I am while Thou art mine And lo from sin and grief and shame I hide me Jesus in Thy name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy mighty Name salvation is And keeps my happy soul above Comfort it brings and power and peace And joy and everlasting love To me with Thy great Name are given Pardon and holiness and heaven{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my All in all Thou art My rest in toil my ease in pain The healing of my broken heart In war my peace in loss my gain My smile beneath the tyrant's frown In shame my glory and my crown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In want my plentiful supply In weakness my almighty power In bonds my perfect liberty My light in Satan's darkest hour In grief my joy unspeakable My life in death - My All in All{/lang-eng}
